quote: Nothing has ever been so painful or delicious as being so close to him and being unable to do anything about it: like eating ice cream so fast on a hot day you get a splitting headache.
quote_letters: NOTHING HAS EVER BEEN SO PAINFUL OR DELICIOUS AS BEING SO CLOSE TO HIM AND BEING UNABLE TO DO ANYTHING ABOUT IT LIKE EATING ICE CREAM SO FAST ON A HOT DAY YOU GET A SPLITTING HEADACHE
